long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you build habits to leave addictive websites. 

To do this it creates a button on the bottom of your screen when you visit an addictive website such as 

 youtube.com
 reddit.com
 instagram.com

When you click a button it will take you to a predetermined website to cure your boredom without being addictive

All websites can be changed by clicking settings button.
